attributes.action: Work with the Ethiopian and Egyptian governments to resolve the Nile dispute
attributes.background: There are serious concerns about the consequences the Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam will have for Egypt. The UK Government has always played a sensible diplomatic role in African affairs and we urge the Government to work with the Ethiopian and Egyptian governments to resolve this dispute.
